snippet.title: Inked (2018) - Launch Trailer (PC)
snippet.description:
This is the launch trailer for an earlier version of the game. For the new trailer please see:
https://youtu.be/jIwZPzUx8oU

Inked is now available for download on App Store and Google Play worldwide, with a refreshed PC and console version coming later in 2021.
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/inked/id1537777979
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.somniumgames.inked

Game Introduction:
Inked is a tale of love and hope told in ink and paper. In this story-driven puzzle game, the players will play as the Nameless Hero who sets out on a journey to save his loved one in a vast and beautiful landscape filled with challenges. Each puzzle takes the player closer to their lost love and unravels a heart-warming and enchanting story.

Follow us on Social:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/inkedgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/inkedgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/inked_game/

#Game​ #IndieGame​ #MobileGame
